subject: Product Review Collaboration Request | PixelPG YouTube Channel
description_text:
I would like to communicate with you to cooperate with our channel in promoting your products on a wider scale.

Our channel provides high-quality content, including comprehensive and detailed reviews of various technical devices. We are keen to shoot videos in a professional cinematic style, to show the product in the best possible image to the viewer.

We aspire to enhance your brand in the Arab region and other regions, by providing content in both Arabic and English, to ensure it reaches a wider audience.



Here is a look at my humble channel dashboard:


[cid:9ea492ae-15d9-4c0e-bdd1-e0ee9bf48175]


Channel name: PixelPG<https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCe1kZUH9Y9J8L4IuMPvRuMA>

+6.5K subscribers and still growing



The video of the comprehensive review consists of:

  1.  Introduction (Introducing your company to viewers)
  2.  Unboxing
  3.  Full Review of the device and its characteristics
  4.  A comprehensive and detailed description of the device
  5.  Performance Test
  6.  Conclusion and the full summary of my experience with the price quote



We create videos in Arabic and English with subtitles and voice audio

And publish the video on our channel, and you can use the video in English on your website

For everyone to benefit from it



We hope that you will give us the opportunity to work with you ?.



Best regards from PixelPG



[cid:e06260e0-a042-4e65-be06-22d4c8d4ff39]

[cid:9be7e8c5-9041-470e-bb71-fb2de28eb379]<https://www.youtube.com/@PixelPG>
